step.cmd: After applying the instructions in or , add an embedded reference to the concept entity within the record-level resource.

info.note: Genre entities should be modeled using the classified_as pattern.

substep.cmd: As the _label of the concept entity, take the value of the top-level entity label.
Process simple concept references for subject headings.
